stories.text:
Hello HN,

I’m stuck in between choosing roles and having a hard time in figuring out where should I specialized

Long story short what other roles can I pursue besides web development
stories.title: Ask HN: What roles can you pursue besides web development?
Remote-first work is taking over the rich world

stories.text:
Hi HN Community,

I've been working on this startup [https://unfake.carrd.co] where we are helping footwear brands fight counterfeits effectively. We are doing so using the power of NFC tags combined with the uniqueness of NFTs.

I've made a prototype. You can check it out on the website mentioned above or here: https://youtu.be/fHCxnHlQIjk

I would like to know the best possible way of reaching out to big footwear brands for demonstrating them the concept in order to tie-up with them.

Let me know if you have any other suggestions/feedback as well.

Peace Hammad Nasir
stories.title: Ask HN: How to reach out to big footwear brands in order to tie-up with them?
